title: TCS launches GenAI platform WisdomNext
description: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) launched the Gen AI platform WisdomNext, aggregating multiple GenAI technologies. The platform helps companies adopt next-gen technology, lower costs, and operate within a regulatory framework.
content: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is moving a significant chunk of its 200+ AI projects from proof-of-concept (PoC) to production with its new aggregate generative AI platform WisdomNext, a senior executive said on Friday.
cleaned_content: tata consultancy services tcs is moving a significant chunk of its <TWO_HUNDRED> ai projects from proof of concept poc to production with its new aggregate generative ai platform wisdomnext a senior executive said on friday
